settings.text:
PRONTO CHOCHO Whole-Food Protein
The Way Nature Intended

A clean, fiber-rich, complete plant protein from one
of the world’s most ancient and nutrient-dense legumes
Known for its complete protein, fiber, and healthy fats, chocho has fueled Andean communities for generations, and now it’s available to you, fast.
PRONTO CHOCHO ™. Instant superfood nutrition. Fast, complete, ready.

settings.title:
A Longevity Food
Rooted in the Andes:
PRONTO CHOCHO
settings.paragraph:
Known for its exceptional combination of protein quality, fiber, healthy fats, and micronutrients, chocho has fueled Andean communities for generations, and now it’s available to you, pronto!

Real-food nourishment. Regenerative by Nature.
Not ultra-processed. Simple. Traditional. Intentional.

settings.accordion_content: Chocho thrives in the Andes without pesticides or heavy irrigation, naturally restoring soil health by fixing nitrogen. This low-impact, non-GMO legume acts as a model for regenerative agriculture, protecting the Earth’s resources while it grows.

Rooted in indigenous heritage, our chocho is hand-sown and harvested as a ritual of care for the community. This traditional approach preserves a vital cultural legacy and ensures shared prosperity for the Andean farmers who guard the land.
We partner with local farmers using a meticulous, multi-day debittering process to maintain the seed's integrity.

settings.description: Discover the journey behind our protein through a cycle of respect that begins in the high mountains and ends by nourishing your body and the planet.

settings.section_title: Ancestral Andean Nutrition Rooted in Purity and Purpose
settings.section_subtitle:
Discover the journey behind our protein: a cycle of respect that begins
in the high mountains and ends by nourishing your body and the planet.
settings.card_1_overlay_message: We work with farmers who practice regenerative agriculture to restore soil health and biodiversity.
settings.card_2_overlay_message: Our products honor centuries-old traditions while embracing modern quality standards.
settings.card_3_overlay_message: Every ingredient is carefully sourced from trusted partners who share our commitment to quality.

seeker who wants to feel their best.

settings.description_1: Known for its complete protein, fiber, and healthy fats, chocho has fueled Andean communities for generations, and now it's available to you, fast.
settings.description_2: Ancient Peruvian superfood known for energy, stamina, and hormonal balance. Sustainably sourced from the Andes mountains.
settings.description_3: A complete protein source with all essential amino acids. Gluten-free and perfect for modern healthy lifestyles.

settings.text:
From smoothies to soups, plant-based lattes to baked goods, PRONTO CHOCHO® blends smoothly into any routine, from the gym bag to the kitchen.

It’s a family-friendly, plant-powered upgrade for every stage of life — from childhood to active aging — delivering clean, balanced, whole-food protein that fits every lifestyle.
